text: The 2013 FIFA Puskás Award was the fifth FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on January 13, 2014, during the 2013 FIFA Ballon d'Or Gala in Switzerland. Paris Saint-Germain player Zlatan Ibrahimović was the winner of the award, for his bicycle kick goal against England in an international friendly. There were two rounds of voting for this award. The first round of voting determined who would finish in the top 3, and the second round of voting was used to determine the winner from the winners in the previous round. title: 2013 FIFA Puskás Award
